name: Tarius
description:
Tarius is a 2.5D Platformer Game, made with Unity3D by Tenacious Arts.

In this game, player will play as Tarius - the main character and player will go through a journey with various environments and obstacles to save his sister. Ancient slingshot must be acquired before the journey begins in order to overcome the obstacles, and it is one of the core mechanic of this game - altogether with platformer.

Visit official website:
http://tariusgame.wordpress.com

Trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hsWT1iTd5VQ
